
delete-placement-group
**********************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Deletes a  PlacementGroup from a user's account. Terminate all Amazon
EC2 instances in the placement group before deletion.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws ec2 delete-placement-group
     --group-name <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--group-name"  (string)
   The name of the "PlacementGroup" to delete.


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
